Nightlight:


Nightlight remained in stasis, but all her past appeared in h=
er dreams
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 16, 2005 2:52 PM
  Subject: Watc=
hers and a family on Maxi ship


  : : Watchers : :
  All the Watchers regr=
oup on the bridge.

  Watcher 1: I think she was telling the truth, I didn'=
t see anyone else.

  Watcher 2: We better get them back to base quickly. T=
hey need a CR chamber.

  Watcher 3: We could reprogram them also. This fem=
mebot has already given us access to her spark, whether she knows it or not=
.

  The fourth Watcher is quiet while he studies Rodimus Prime.

  Watcher=
 4: We must be quick about this. It would be best if no other factions lear=
ned that these two were here yet.

  Watcher 1: What is so important about =
these two?

  Watcher 4: I am suprised that you did not pick up on your his=
tory yet.

  Watcher 1: What do you mean?

  Watcher 4 points at Rodimus Pr=
ime.

  Watcher 4: This one is an Autobot. Not just any Autobot, either. He=
 is Hot Rod, the chosen one of the ancient Matrix prophecy. This one became=
 Rodimus Prime and used the Matrix to destroy Unicron. He was one of the fi=
rst Targetmasters. At last report he had been leading the Maximal faction h=
ere on Pre-Earth during the Neo Beast Wars. He had disspeared by the time T=
ransformers started colonizing here.

  Watcher 1: So we got us a sure fire=
 legend on our hands, eh? Get them to base and repaired now.

  Lord Elder(=
via commlink): When they have awakened from repairs send them to me.

  Wat=
cher 1: You heard him. Lets get this done.

  The Watchers procede as order=
ed.



  Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
    Nightlight:

    Pain was=
 high, she couldn't stand it and she could remain on line for so long "No b=
oy else is in this ship... Just us... ple... se... Let us stay togeth..er"
=

    The femme couldn't be on line more and she fell in stasis, one of her =
wing fell and revealed that a hit had opened a midle sinze hole that let ev=
ery one watch part her spark.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fro=
m: Airly 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 14, =
2005 5:12 PM
      Subject: Re: Others awakenings/comlinks with leaders


 =
     Nightlight:

      The femme sobbed when she watched hers husband fell=
 in stasis and she tried to crawled towards him in attemp to help him, then=
 she saw and heard the Watchers arrive 

      "WHo're ya?"she said worried=
, would be they friends or foes...? Pain was high... she fought to dont' fe=
ll in stasis..."Nobody else is here... Just us"

      IF they where foes, =
she tought, they woulnd't find out anything about her daughter; if they wer=
e friends, then they could help them to find Elita...
